SMW Subobject for WornHigh Alchemy value: 480Examine: A really surprisingly aerodynamic cape.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Spottier capeUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Spottier cape.pngWeight: -4.535Value: 800Version anchor: WornRelease date: 21 November 2006Item ID: 10074

A spottier cape is a weight-reducing item requiring 66 Hunter to be equipped reducing weight by 4.535 kg. While this item provides a greater weight-reduction than the graceful cape, it does not boost the player's run energy restoration rate.

To make it, two dashing kebbit furs and 800 coins must be brought to the Fancy Clothes Store in south-eastern Varrock; doing so and then equipping the cape is a hard Varrock Diary task.

Dashing kebbit fur is obtained at the Piscatoris falconry area south of the Piscatoris Fishing Colony by catching dashing kebbits, requiring 69 Hunter.

This item can be stored in the cape rack of a costume room.

[[File:Spottier cape detail.png|left|120px]]
A '''spottier cape''' is a [[weight-reducing item]] requiring 66 [[Hunter]] to be equipped reducing [[weight]] by 4.535 kg. While this item provides a greater weight-reduction than the [[graceful cape]], it does not boost the player's [[Energy|run energy]] restoration rate. 

To make it, two [[dashing kebbit fur]]s and {{NoCoins|800}} coins must be brought to the [[Fancy Clothes Store]] in south-eastern [[Varrock]]; doing so and then equipping the cape is a [[hard Varrock Diary]] task. 

Dashing kebbit fur is obtained at the [[Piscatoris falconry area]] south of the [[Piscatoris Fishing Colony]] by catching [[dashing kebbit]]s, requiring 69 Hunter.

{{Costume storage|cape rack}}
